name: 徐永富
objective:
1.X光之本質
2.晶体幾何及倒置晶格
3.晶體立體投影
4.X光繞射原理
5.X光繞射實驗方法(繞射儀，Laue照相法，粉末法)
6.X光繞射之應用(包括晶體結構之鑑定，晶格常數之量測，相圖測定，序化一非序化轉換及化學成分分析等)
schedule:
週次  單元主題
1   Properties and Production of X-rays
2   Properties and Production of X-rays
3   Geometry of Crystals
4   Geometry of Crystals
5   Projections of Crystals
6   Projections of Crystals
7   Elements of Diffraction Theory
8   Elements of Diffraction Theory
9   期中考試
10  Elements of Diffraction Theory
11  Laue Photographs
12  Powder Photographs
13  Powder Photographs
14  Diffractometer Methods
15  Applications of X-ray Diffraction
16  Applications of X-ray Diffraction
17  期末報告
18  期末考試
scorePolicy:
期中考 35%
期末考 35%
期末報告+課堂表現 30%
materials: Text: ”Elements of X-Ray Diffraction” 3rd ed. b. D. Cullity and S.R. Stock, 2001
